opinion.opinion_text:
Judgment affirmed without opinion pursuant to Rule 59.
All the Justices concur.
opinion.posture: Title to Land. Dougherty County Superior. Before Hon. Loring A. Gray.
opinion.attorneys:
T. Lee Bishop, Jr., for Appellant.
Shell Lanier Rutledge, McCALLA, RAYMER, PADRICK, COBB, ET AL, Evans J. Plowden, WATSON, SPENCE, LOWE CHAMBLESS, LLP, for Appellee.Page 1
